item.title: Making a Simple ERC20 Token
item.author: Author
item.description: Implementing the ERC20 standard to make a simple fungible token on Etheruem

item.title: Reading List: September 2021
item.author: Author
item.description: a list of articles, courses, books, videos, and any other things that I found personally interesting and went through them

item.title: A Guide to Install TeX on Linux
item.author: Author
item.description: I’ve personally found it a headache to install TeX on Linux for people new to Tex (for example, me). So I decided to write a concise guide for it.

item.title: Coding Problem: First Missing Positive Integer
item.author: Author
item.description: Given an array of integers, find the first missing positive integer in linear time and constant space.

item.title: Coding Problem: Serialize a Binary Tree
item.author: Author
item.description: Design an algorithm to serialize and deserialize a binary tree.

item.title: Coding Problem: Two Sum
item.author: Author
item.description: Given a list of numbers and a number k, return whether any two numbers from the list add up to k.
